ca.ualberta.cs.phebert.litx

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.phebert.litx.Book
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Book object, has a title, author, isbn and other fields to know where it is in the database
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    phebert, sdupasqu, plontke
    See Also:
    MyBooksActivity, SearchActivity, ExchangeActivity, MainActivity, User, Request, BookStatusActivity, BookViewActivity, AddBookActivity, BookListAdapter, TopTenAdapter, ViewPhotoActivity, Serialized Form
